course.title: Best Practices, Microservices, and Deep Learning in Production

childMarkdownRemark.html: In this course student will learn what are Deep Learning best practices and how to handle deep learning in production. The students will then learn how to develop microservices in Python and deploy them on Kubernetes clusters. At the end of the course we will learn how to manage containers and machine learning infrastructure in the public and private clouds using Kubernetes and Kubeflow.

textBooks.title: Deep Learning with Python, Second Edition
Kubeflow Operations Guide
textBooks.authors: Austin Harris, Michael Katzenellenbogen, Josh Patterson

sections.title: Deep Learning in Production and Best Practices

lineItem.title: Best Practices for the Real World

Develop AI based smart applications. This technical track will provide a solid foundation in AI concepts and technologies. Innovation and application development track will supplement the AI and will develop the necessary skills to build end-to-end smart applications.

content.value: Main Libraries and Frameworks: TensorFlow, NumPy, Pandas, and Flask
Secondary Libraries and Frameworks: Kubernetes, and Kubeflow

courses.title: AI for Everyone and Fundamentals of Programming using Python

childMarkdownRemark.html: We will start this course by understand the fundamentals and use cases for AI. Then, we'll learn about basic programming concepts using Python, such as lists, dictionaries, classes, functions and loops, and practice writing clean and readable code with exercises for each topic. We'll also learn how to make your programs interactive and how to test your code safely before adding it to a project. It is a fast-paced, thorough introduction to programming with Python 3.8 that will have you writing programs, solving problems, and making things that work in no time.

textBooks.title: A Smarter Way to Learn Python: Learn it faster. Remember it longer

referenceBooks.title: Python Crash Course: A Hands-On, Project-Based Introduction to Programming 2nd Edition

sections.title: Introduction to Machine Learning, Data Science and AI

PIAIC AI Program is training developers for the role of Software Engineer -ML. They require the following skills: a. Data Engineering b. Modeling c. Deployment d. AI Infrastructure https://workera.ai/candidates/report/

courses.title: Data Analysis and Introduction to Deep Learning

childMarkdownRemark.html: We start the course by learning NumPy the backbone of scientific computing and used extensively with TensorFlow. NumPy will give you both speed and high productivity. Then we will walk you through Pandas with clear, step-by-step examples and just the right amount of theory. The first part of the course focuses on the fundamentals of NumPy and Pandas, including array objects, functions, and matrices, each of them explained with practical examples. In next part of the course will offer a practical, hands-on exploration of introduction to deep learning using Keras/Tensorflow 2.0. We will avoid mathematical notation, preferring instead to explain quantitative concepts via code snippets and to build practical intuition about the core ideas of machine learning and deep learning.

textBooks.title: Deep Learning with Python, Second Edition
